00036 plugin_manager::plugin_manager(string cfgfile)
00037 {
00038 
00039     //Here we should get all the XML information
00040     //to deal with the plugins, etc.
00041     if(XML_parser::get_singleton()->parse_general_configuration_file(cfgfile))
00042         general_properties_ = XML_parser::get_singleton()->get_general_properties();
00043 
00044     if(!load_plugins()) {
00045         unload_plugins();
00046         throw runtime_error("The plugin manager was not able to load all the plugins");
00047     }
00048     
00049     if(!initialize_dds(general_properties_.domain_id,
00050                        general_properties_.qos_file,
00051                        general_properties_.qos_library,
00052                        general_properties_.qos_profile)) {
00053         throw runtime_error("The plugin manager was not able to initialize DDS on all the plugins");
00054         shutdown_dds();
00055         unload_plugins();
00056     }
00057     
00058 }
00059 
00060  
00068 plugin_manager::~plugin_manager()
00069 {
00070     shutdown_dds();
00071     unload_plugins();
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00083 bool plugin_manager::load_plugins()
00084 {
00085     for(map<string, list<string> >::iterator it = general_properties_.plugin_list_map.begin();
00086         it != general_properties_.plugin_list_map.end(); ++it)
00087         for(list<string>::iterator it2 = (it->second).begin();
00088             it2 != (it->second).end(); ++it2)
00089             if(!load_plugin(*it2,it->first)) //(name,dir)
00090                 return false;
00091     
00092     return true;
00093 }
00094 
00101 void plugin_manager::unload_plugins()
00102 {
00103     for(map<string, cc_plugin*>::iterator it = plugin_map_.begin();
00104         it != plugin_map_.end(); ++it)
00105         it->second->destroy_plugin();
00106     
00107     for(map<string, void*>::iterator it = libraries_map_.begin();
00108         it != libraries_map_.end(); ++it)
00109         RTIOsapiLibrary_close(it->second);
00110 }
00111 
00122 bool plugin_manager::load_plugin(string plugin_name, string plugin_library)
00123 {
00124 
00125     //TODO: if we want to put both dynamic libraries and configuration files
00126     //within the same directory we would have to change this line.
00127     // string library_path(LIBDIR);
00128     if(!XML_parser::get_singleton()->
00129        parse_plugin_configuration_file(string(plugin_library+"/"+
00130                                               plugin_name+"/"+plugin_name+".xml")))
00131         return false;
00132            
00133     plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name] = XML_parser::get_singleton()->get_plugin_properties(plugin_name);
00134  
00135     libraries_map_[plugin_name] = RTIOsapiLibrary_open((plugin_library + "/" +
00136                                                         plugin_name + "/" +
00137                                                         plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name].dll).c_str(),
00138                                                        RTI_OSAPI_LIBRARY_RTLD_NOW);
00139 
00140     if(libraries_map_[plugin_name] == NULL)
00141         return false;
00142 
00143     cc_create_plugin_t * create_fnc = (cc_create_plugin_t *)
00144         RTIOsapiLibrary_getSymbolAddress(libraries_map_[plugin_name], 
00145                                          plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name].create_function.c_str());
00146     
00147     try {
00148         plugin_map_[plugin_name] = create_fnc(plugin_name, 
00149                                               plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name].plugin_config);
00150         if(plugin_map_[plugin_name] == NULL)
00151             return false;
00152     }
00153     catch (exception& e) {
00154         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00155         return false;
00156     }
00157 
00158     //If everything was correct we set the period counter for the plugin
00159     // period_counter_map_[plugin_name] = plugin_properties_map_[plugin_name].publishing_period;
00160     period_counter_map_[plugin_name] = 0;
00161     return true;
00162 
00163 }

00165 
00179 bool plugin_manager::initialize_dds(int domain_id, 
00180                                     string qos_configuration_file,
00181                                     string qos_library,
00182                                     string qos_profile)
00183 {
00184     //Create DomainParticipant and the Publisher
00185     if(!create_dds_participant_and_publisher(domain_id, qos_configuration_file, qos_library, qos_profile)) 
00186         return  false;
00187         
00188     //..then we create on DataWriter for each plugin
00189     for(map<string, cc_plugin*>::iterator it = plugin_map_.begin();
00190         it != plugin_map_.end(); ++it) {
00191         if(!create_dds_topic_and_datawriter(it->first,
00192                                             plugin_properties_map_[it->first].qos_library,
00193                                             plugin_properties_map_[it->first].qos_profile,
00194                                             plugin_properties_map_[it->first].topic_name,
00195                                             (DDS_TypeCode *)plugin_properties_map_[it->first].type_code,
00196                                             (DDS_DataWriterQos *)plugin_properties_map_[it->first].datawriter_qos)) {
00197             shutdown_dds();
00198             return false;
00199         }
00200     }
00201            
00202     return true;
00203 }
00204 
00205 
00219 bool plugin_manager::create_dds_participant_and_publisher(int domain_id,
00220                                                           string qos_configuration_file,
00221                                                           string qos_library,
00222                                                           string qos_profile)
00223 {
00224 
00225     DDS_DomainParticipantFactoryQos factory_qos;
00226     DDSTheParticipantFactory->get_qos(factory_qos);
00227     factory_qos.profile.url_profile.ensure_length(1,1);
00228     factory_qos.profile.url_profile[0] = DDS_String_dup(qos_configuration_file.c_str());
00229     
00230     DDSTheParticipantFactory->set_qos(factory_qos);
00231 
00232 
00233     if (qos_profile == "default") { //We use the default QoS profile
00234 
00235         //Created DDS Domain Participant
00236         participant_ = DDSTheParticipantFactory->
00237             create_participant(domain_id, //Domain ID
00238                                DDS_PARTICIPANT_QOS_DEFAULT, //QoS
00239                                NULL, //Listener
00240                                DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00241         if (participant_ == NULL) {
00242             cerr << "create_participant error" << endl;
00243             return false;
00244         }
00245 
00246         //Created DDS Publisher
00247         publisher_ = participant_->create_publisher(DDS_PUBLISHER_QOS_DEFAULT,
00248                                                     NULL,
00249                                                     DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00250         if (publisher_ == NULL) {
00251             cerr << "create_publisher error" << endl;
00252             return false;
00253         }
00254     }
00255   
00256     else { //We have defined a QoS profile within a QoS library
00257         participant_ = DDSTheParticipantFactory->
00258             create_participant_with_profile(domain_id,
00259                                             qos_library.c_str(),
00260                                             qos_profile.c_str(),
00261                                             NULL,
00262                                             DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00263         if (participant_ == NULL) {
00264             cerr << "create_participant_with_profile error" << endl;
00265             return false;
00266         }
00267     
00268         publisher_ = participant_->
00269             create_publisher_with_profile(qos_library.c_str(), //library
00270                                           qos_profile.c_str(), //profile
00271                                           NULL, // listener
00272                                           DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00273         if (publisher_ == NULL) {
00274             cerr << "create_publisher_with_profile error" << endl;
00275             return false;    
00276         }
00277     }
00278 
00279 
00280     return true;
00281 }

00283 
00298 bool plugin_manager::create_dds_topic_and_datawriter(std::string plugin_name,
00299                                                      std::string qos_library,
00300                                                      std::string qos_profile,
00301                                                      std::string topic_name,
00302                                                      DDS_TypeCode *type_code,
00303                                                      DDS_DataWriterQos *datawriter_qos)
00304 {
00305     
00306     DDS_TypeCodeFactory *typecode_factory = NULL;
00307     DDSTopic *topic = NULL;
00308     DDSDataWriter *writer = NULL;
00309     DDSDynamicDataTypeSupport *type_support = NULL;
00310     const char *type_name = NULL;
00311 
00312     DDS_ReturnCode_t retcode;
00313 
00314     typecode_factory = DDS_TypeCodeFactory::get_instance();
00315 
00316     
00317     //Create type code for disk type    
00318     if(type_code == NULL) {
00319         cerr << "error creating " << plugin_name << " typecode" << endl;
00320         return false;
00321     }
00322     
00323     //create dynamic type support for type code
00324     type_support = new DDSDynamicDataTypeSupport(type_code,
00325                                                  DDS_DYNAMIC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY_DEFAULT);
00326     if(type_support == NULL) {
00327         cerr << plugin_name << "Error in creating type support" << endl;
00328         return false;
00329     }
00330     type_name = type_support->get_type_name();
00331 
00332     //Register type before creating topic
00333     retcode = type_support->register_type(participant_, type_name);
00334     if (retcode != DDS_RETCODE_OK) {
00335         cerr << plugin_name << "register_type error " << endl;
00336         return false;
00337     }
00338 
00339     //Create topic
00340     topic = participant_->create_topic(topic_name.c_str(),
00341                                        type_name, 
00342                                        DDS_TOPIC_QOS_DEFAULT, 
00343                                        NULL /* listener */,
00344                                        DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00345     if (topic == NULL) {
00346         cerr << topic_name << "create_topic error" << endl;
00347         return false;
00348     }
00349     
00350     if(datawriter_qos == NULL) {
00351         //Create DataWriter
00352         if(qos_profile == "default") { //We use the default QoS profile
00353             writer = publisher_->create_datawriter(topic, 
00354                                                    DDS_DATAWRITER_QOS_DEFAULT, 
00355                                                    NULL /* listener */,
00356                                                    DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00357         }
00358         
00359         else { //We use a Qos profile defined within a QoS library
00360             writer = publisher_->
00361                 create_datawriter_with_profile(topic, 
00362                                                qos_library.c_str() /*library*/, 
00363                                                qos_profile.c_str() /*profile*/,
00364                                                NULL /* listener */,
00365                                                DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00366         }
00367     }
00368 
00369     else { //If specified DataWriter QoS
00370         writer = publisher_->create_datawriter(topic,
00371                                                *datawriter_qos,
00372                                                NULL,
00373                                                DDS_STATUS_MASK_NONE);
00374     }
00375     
00376     if (writer == NULL) {
00377         cerr << plugin_name << "Create_datawriter error" << endl;
00378         return false;
00379     }
00380     
00381     dynamicdata_info_map_[plugin_name].writer = NULL;
00382     dynamicdata_info_map_[plugin_name].writer = DDSDynamicDataWriter::narrow(writer);
00383     if (dynamicdata_info_map_[plugin_name].writer == NULL) {
00384         cerr << plugin_name << "DataWriter narrow error" << endl;
00385         return false;
00386     }
00387     
00388     /* Create data sample for writing */
00389     dynamicdata_info_map_[plugin_name].data = type_support->create_data();
00390     if (dynamicdata_info_map_[plugin_name].data == NULL) {
00391         cerr << "create_data error" << endl;
00392         return false;
00393     }
00394     
00395     return true;
00396 }
00397 
00398 
00407 bool plugin_manager::shutdown_dds()
00408 {
00409     DDS_ReturnCode_t retcode;
00410     if (participant_ != NULL) {
00411         retcode = participant_->delete_contained_entities();
00412         if (retcode != DDS_RETCODE_OK) {
00413             cerr << "delete_contained_entities error" << endl;
00414             return false;
00415         }
00416         
00417         retcode = DDSTheParticipantFactory->delete_participant(participant_);
00418         if (retcode != DDS_RETCODE_OK) {
00419             cerr << "Delete_participant error" << endl;
00420             return false;
00421         }
00422     }
00423 
00424     return true;
00425 }

00427 
00435 void plugin_manager::publish_plugins_information()
00436 {
00437 
00438     for(map<string, cc_plugin*>::iterator it = plugin_map_.begin();
00439         it != plugin_map_.end(); ++it) {
00440         //Checks if it is its turn to publish
00441         if(period_counter_map_[it->first] <= 0) {
00442             it->second->
00443                 generate_and_publish_information(dynamicdata_info_map_[it->first].writer,
00444                                                  dynamicdata_info_map_[it->first].data);
00445             period_counter_map_[it->first] =  plugin_properties_map_[it->first].publishing_period - general_properties_.publishing_period;
00446 
00447         }
00448 
00449         else {
00450             period_counter_map_[it->first] -= general_properties_.publishing_period;
00451 
00452         }
00453     }
00454     DDS_Duration_t publishing_period;
00455     publishing_period.sec = general_properties_.publishing_period;
00456     publishing_period.nanosec = 0;
00457     NDDSUtility::sleep(publishing_period);
00458 
00459 }
